title.rendered: How do I delete my account on Roomi?

content.rendered:
You can delete your Roomi account at any time. If you change your mind, we will not be able to recover it.

Please contact hello@roomiapp.com and our team will remove your information from our servers.

excerpt.rendered: You can delete your Roomi account at any time. If you change your mind, we will not be able to recover it. Please contact hello@roomiapp.com and our team will remove your information…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I permanently delete my room listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Web Please note: Your listing must be deactivated before it can be deleted. Login to your Roomi account from our homepage and click My ListingsClick the Inactive tabClick the trash can icon to delete your listing iOS Tap on My Listings from the menu at the bottomTap the X icon…

jetpack-related-posts.title: More information about Global ID
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: How does GlobaliD preserve my data/privacy? GlobaliD protects your privacy and data through our verification system and industry-leading security practices. GlobaliD verifications are statements that describe something about you that an independent, third-party verification agency has verified to be true. jetpack-related-posts.title: Is Roomi free to use?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Yes! It's free to create an account Roomi for personal and business use.  If you're looking to rent out your room: you can have up to two active listings at a time and connect with up to 5 people per day for free. If you're looking for a roommate or…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roomi vs Nooklyn: Which is the Best Roommate Finder?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Opting for a roommate isn't just about saving money on rent and utilities. It is about finding companionship in a new environment. It is about security in a place where you have no one else. What this means is that beyond just having a roommate, having the right roommate is…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roomi vs Diggz: Choosing the Best Roommate Finder
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: When it comes to any significant changes in our lives, we want to make sure that we make the right decision. And the same goes with choosing a roommate! There are many websites and apps that you can use, but you're probably wondering, what's the best website to find roommates?…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roommates.com vs Roomi: Which is the best Roommate Finder in New York?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Moving to a new city is a nerve-wracking experience, especially when you don't have any familiar faces around.
